indiyanu karmantha mandalaya wasara 118k parani sangamayak wana athara wyaparikayan 7100 kagen sadumlath indiyawe paranima wanija mandalaya we.shri lankawe pawathina samakami wathawaranaya hethu kota gena wisheshayenma uthure pawathina aayojana awastha prayojanayata ganimin uthuru nangenahira pradeshawala thama aayojana katayuthu kirimata balaporoththu wana bawa indiya wyaparikayo badiyudin amathyawarayata pawasu athara, ema pradeshawala ilektronika upanga nishpadana karmantha aarambha kirima kerehi thama wishesha awadhanaya yomu wi athi bawada indiya wyaparikayo wadi duratath prakasha kalaha.shri lankawe karmantha kshethrayata adala wisheshagnya thorathuru thakshana danuma derata athara mithrathwaya thahawuru karanu was shri lankawata oonama awasthawaka laba dimata haki bawada indiya karmantha sangamaye sabhapathi gopal krishnan mahatha badiyudin amathiwarayata prakasha kaleya.shri lankawa ha indiyawa athara kriyathmaka indu - lanka nidahas welenda giwisuma 2000 marthu 01 dina athsan thabu athara eya 2008 nowambar sita purna washayen kriyawata nanwa atha.
